name: Emotiscope FFT
description: Advanced frequency spectrum with beat-modulated intensity. Shows full 64-bin FFT with beat pulse gating for rhythm-synchronized visualization.
artistic_intent: Dynamic spectrum that pulses with the beat. Frequency content is highlighted when the beat is strong, creating a hypnotic synchronization between rhythm and pitch visualization.

nodes.description: Scale beat to 0-0.7 range for modulation
Boost spectrum when beat is present

notes.beat_modulation: Beat magnitude is scaled and added to spectrum values, brightening the entire spectrum when the beat is strong
notes.spectral_response: 64 frequency bins provide full-spectrum visualization with smooth interpolation between bins
